name: meyer
title: Meyer
rule:
How to play!

Roll the dice and give the phone to the next person, clockwise.

Combinations:
  • 1+2: Meyer!
  • 1+3: Little Meyer!
  • 2+3: Cheers!
  • 6+6: Pair 6 and so on
  • 6+5: 65 and so on
Next player

The next player has to roll higher than the previous player

Roll

Upon rolling the dice, the player have the option to lie or tell the truth

Lift

If the player don't believe what the previous player claims he/she rolled, the player has the option to lift, to showcase if the previous player lied or not.

If the previous player lied, they has to drink. If they told the truth, the player who chose lift, has to drink

It or above

If the player did not roll higher than the previous player, they will have a second chance, but what is rolled is not showcased for them.

name: speed
title: Reaction
rule:
How to play!

Click on the circles as fast as you can, and test your reaction time, whoever has the slowest time amongst the group, has to drink!

name: pictionary
title: Pictionary
rule:
How to play!

Divide into groups of 2

When it is your teammates turn to draw, you have to guess what he has drawn on the canvas

If you guess correctly the opposite team has to drink

If you guess incorrect your team has to drink

name: never
title: Never Have I Ever
rule:
How to play!

Click on the card to see the next question

A card is shown, if you have done what is shown on the card, you has to drink, otherwise don't.

name: overunder
title: Over/Under
rule:
How to play!

The player has the option to choose between higher or lower of the card that is shown, if you guess incorrectly you has to drink!

Ranging between Ace being the lowest and king being the highest

Whoever gets the lowest score amongst your group, has to do a dare, chosen by the winner
